website_summaries.verdict: A good lawn mower from Sun Joe if you want a larger cutting head on an electric platform.
pros: The 13-amp motor offers enough power to cut through thick grass
Cutting height is adjustable with a seven-position control lever
Comes with a full two-year warranty
cons: Setting the mower up the first time can be difficult due to the lack of a parts list and unclear instructions

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I've only used gasoline mowers for 40 + years so this was a leap of faith. After reading feedback from many others who purchased this item and understanding its power needs. I purchased the 13 amp unit and also a 100 ft 12/3 20 amp cord for about $60 more bucks. Used it for about 1 hour right out of the box and flawlessly trimmed up my lawn. Very quiet & well balanced. The trim height adjustment is fantastic as well. It's super light and very agile around flower beds and trees. I'm happy i won't have to store gas anymore or pray that it starts. The proper power cord is essential.
customer_reviews.author: Todd F.

customer_reviews.title: Lousy assembly instructions, but nice when together
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a 40 Year old Sunbeam that I could no longer get parts for. Mows Great, Fairly quiet and fairly light to push. But I am glad I am mechanically inclined as the assembly instructions are about the vaguest I have seen in ages. Improvements needed : 1) Inventory of what is supposed to be in the carton 2) Update the fig 1 illustration to match the Handle Bolts,now with saddles. 3) Instruct user to place the cord clips (one does show in the fig2 drawing 4) tell us what to do with the small bone shaped plastic part (some sort of latch?) 5) remind us to hook the edges of the catcher BAG over the wire bail
customer_reviews.author: TheDucks

customer_reviews.title: This is a Fun and Fine Machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine is really easy to maneuver, cuts great and does my 1/4 acre lawn nicely. Only one caveat, be very careful about the extension cord and that it matches exactly the recommended extension chord that you can buy with the product. I used an extension cord with a different amp number and it overheated and destroyed the motor. The company was very kind and sent me a free replacement in less than a week. Probably you should order the extension cord that Sun Jo sells with the machine. Don't make the mistake of buying the cheapest extension cord at Walmart, as I did.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Raskin

customer_reviews.title: This mower is junk! So disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: This mower is junk! It didn't even last 2 months. Worked fine several times, then the mower blade loosened from the motor. There's nothing but a large plastic screw holding it on, and tightening it doesn't help. The motor spins freely with the blade bouncing wildly underneath. Naturally, the manufacturer is conveniently closed on the weekends, so you can't can even contact them to ask for a replacement when you really need to reach them. Save your time, money, and frustration - buy something better from another company. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value for the Cost and Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This mower is very well built and designed even better. We have been using the unit as a mulching mower so we don't have to dispose of the clippings. Nice selection of mowing heights. I love this unit. It does require an electric cord which is what keeps the weight down - no batteries and of course no oil or gasoline to store. We ordered an Amazon 16 gauge cord 100' in length to use with the unit and it does work fine but the cord does get warm, not hot, which means that a larger gauge, maybe 14, would be a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence

customer_reviews.title: Got what I was expecting. not
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this exact model 3 years ago. Had it assembled and ready to use in less than 30 minutes. Runs, cuts like a dream and you can't beat this price!? However, the warranty is a joke. Supposed to be 2 years; it died at 10.5 months. 4 phone calls to their numbers and 3 emails ... they answered the 1st email for a suggestion to try a "hard restart" which didn't work and I told them ... week and a half later no responses. My lawn isn't stopping growing so I will go find a mower NOT called Sun Joe.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B

customer_reviews.title: Rare combination of an excellent product and excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely leave a review - this one deserves one! Bought this mower 15 month ago - it's light weight and feels like a toy - works like a real heavyweight. Easy to maneuver and the mulching function works great. I have not collected any clippings for over a year and my lawn looks healthier than ever. 10 days ago something burned out and it stopped working - called the company, got a live person on the phone, he collected the needed info, emailed me a prepaid label to send back the mower, once I received a new one. It came today - 1 week later! I am impressed!
customer_reviews.author: LUCKY

customer_reviews.title: Parts
customer_reviews.text: The mower is OK so far. I was looking for the future when I need parts like a blade. Well, you can't get parts, all are out of stock. I googled the blade (Sun Joe MJ403E Replacement Blade) and over 2 hours checking ever site until I got headache and gave up. The mower looks OK but I'm thinking about sending it back. If you can't get parts, you will have to buy another mower! What company still buying equipment and don't have parts? I would NOT recommend the mower or the company sun joe for anything they sell.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it...
customer_reviews.text: The height adjustment seemed to be stuck at the front right wheel. It was visibly crooked. Sheared the grass off right at the ground. Sun Joe graciously sent me a replacement mower, but this was so cheap and plasticky that I returned it. It is adequate for very small, very trim yards. I have lots of weeds and without the height adjustment working properly, I didn't dare tackle them with this. It was like a fisher price toy mower!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: In love with Moe Joe!!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a push mower but I let my grass get way too long, so final got this mower. It has been amazing. We tackled both the front and back yard in record time, even though the grass was above my ankles. Light enough to push with one hand. I have been using the mulching plug and haven't seen any clumpy grass, even when it was slightly damp this morning.
customer_reviews.author: HMB

customer_reviews.title: Great for middle to small lawns.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, easy to put together, easily adjusts and can cut some serious grass. What more could you want? No oil, no gas no fiddling with the primer bulb/choke settings to start the damn thing. It's wonderful and well priced. Will this last 20 years? If treated well (and by that I mean take a modicum of care) the motor definitely should. The plastic housing? That'll depend on the UV break down.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Mower
customer_reviews.text: This mower is FANTASTIC! Lightweight, easy to push around and very powerful. I purchased the mower where you need to plug it in in order to use it. I was afraid I would run out of battery in the middle of mowing if I didn't. The cord is a little tricky to work around but I feel it was worth it. I've also purchased the tree cutting saw and it worked great and I'll be purchasing the trimmer in spring. I have a small city yard and this mower's size works out very well.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Light & no self-propel needed!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly simple to put together handle-2 parts with East to screw on components. St Augustine grass using highest setting. Floated over 4" thick grass I didn't feel it was hard to push or turn. Plug in and go! Easy to move around...like a vacuum! Hardest part is dragging cord behind you. I purchased an orange extension cord so I can see it in the grass. Did a great job hope it holds up ...plastic except blades and handle.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy G.

customer_reviews.title: Single use only!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have a pretty small yard to mow, and had years of satisfied use from an electric mower from another manufacturer. This one, however only gave me only three uses before throwing sparks and completely quitting on me. It would not even start again. Do not buy this unless you plan for it to be a disposable unit. If you intend to use it once and then throw it away, by all means do that, but do not expect to get even a full season of mowing before you need to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on 10-25-18. Was not able to use right away because of the rainy weather. Once the weather cleared and the ground was dry, we gave Sun Joe a whirl. He was amazing! Easy to maneuver, easy assembly. Unfortunately, Sun Joe lasted less than a year. Used him approximately less than 10 times before the motor burned out (that was our best guess, judging by the smoke and smell). Really enjoyed him while he worked. He got the job done faster than any of our string trimmers, but for the money spent on Sun Joe it was a disappointment. String trimmers are much cheaper, and have lasted us for years at a time.
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: Get the right cord a
customer_reviews.text: We have a small area near the house that can’t be reached on our riding mower. This machine is probably overkill, but it works well out of the box. WARNING - AMAZON’S RECOMMENDATION FOR CORD IS NOT HEAVY ENOUGH FOR THIS MOWER. If you read the instructions carefully, it needs a fairly heavy extension cord, a trivial expense to keep your mower working.
customer_reviews.author: NDM

customer_reviews.title: awlful performance
customer_reviews.text: i bought this in april of 2020 and already it chocks and stops at least 10x time while attemping to move a very small area the battery will not last for even the whole yard keep in mind i have about 6 ft of grass on all sides of my home and i live in a double wide manufature home this mover is worthless buy something better i just wasted my money
customer_reviews.author: debra kay

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the reviews.. didn’t make it once around my property.. before it died.... buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Blade got stuck constantly and cut grass too deep even at the highest position
customer_reviews.text: I like Sun Joe's battery powered model but it can only cut 1/3 of my yard with each charge. So I ordered this electrical core powered one and find it is so much worse than the battery one. It cut grass so deep that yard looks bare. I have to water the yard for a week to turn it green. And its blade got stuck with cut grass constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Cat

customer_reviews.title: Nice one mower 👍
customer_reviews.text: I need mower so that I bought Sun Joe mower. It's pretty cool, easy to assemble, light weight and easy to maneuverability. I liked more than I expected, very easy to use. It's not used gasoline, but it's used power so that it can be saved more money. So I like this mower.
customer_reviews.author: San Oo

customer_reviews.title: My Wife Loves It!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mower for my wife to use..... since I am currently deployed. The gas mower we have was way too heavy for her to push in some areas, so i looked for a lightweight electric mower. It was easy to assemble and she put it together all by herself and she loves it!!! She has used the mower 3 times since the purchase and I think I lost one job when I get home. She wants to do all the mowing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery M. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight yet powerful!
customer_reviews.text: Have mowed my lawn three times now and am very pleased. Cuts even high thick Louisiana grass, and am blown away by how light and maneuverable it is. Weighs about half as much as my old electric mower. And the price is great. In my area a single mow from a contractor goes for about $75, so after two mows this has paid for itself.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Jaros

customer_reviews.title: It worked fine for a small lawn and did the job
customer_reviews.text: I bought the MJ403E in 2015 because I didn't want to deal with a gas mower any longer. It worked fine for a small lawn and did the job, nothing fancy, until a month ago. The engine just got slower but it still worked. Finally it just wouldn't start. I used a 12 gauge electrical cord like others recommended, so I don't know what caused the problem. I figured I'd call for warrant information and I was surprised at the great support. They are going to ship another and with a return label. Couldn't ask for more from Sun Joe but stand behind their product which they did. I'll update with the conclusion.
customer_reviews.author: ken der

customer_reviews.title: First time electric user
customer_reviews.text: This is my first electric mower. My yard is small but i seem to go through a mower a year. It dies in the rain every year lol. I got this because I saw how compact it was to breakdown after. It's a little bigger than I thought it would be but definitely a space saver! Like I said first electric so a little bit different to use. A lot of flipping the extension cord in between lines but I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis

customer_reviews.title: It's a great little mower
customer_reviews.text: I've used this now for a few months so here is my opinion. It's a great little mower! I live in Florida and have a small front lawn and a small back lawn. This mower is very light and easy to push. The 13 Amp motor had plenty of power. I don't use the bag, just leave the mulching plug in. Be sure to use the proper sized extension cord or you will burn out the motor. I use 75ft "14" gauge cord and have no problems.
customer_reviews.author: david223

customer_reviews.title: Mower is fine. Cords blow.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first electric mower and as such I was hesitant that it might not have the needed power to mow down taller/thicker grass. Good news, it’s powerful enough to mow all types of grass. MAKE SURE YOU ONLY USE 14 GUAGE EXTENSION CORD. Standard home extension cord is 16 gauge. THAT WILL KILL THE ENGINE. Anyhow the major con is that mowing the lawn with a cord dragging behind you makes it a much more difficult, frustrating and long task.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: working well
customer_reviews.text: Going from a gas mower to a corded electric, takes a bit of adjustment. I had to change how I mowed because of the cord. The mower works well, cuts clean and does not bog down (unless I have the deck to low) . The one complaint I have with the mower is that it's not balanced right. Front end is very light. So liight that if the bag has much in it it will lift the front off the gound.
customer_reviews.author: Scott in Maine

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for a old lady
customer_reviews.text: My family kept telling me I need a yard man, huh! Yes, it had gotten hard for me to pull the cable to start my old mower even though it was only a year old. So I sold it and bought my Sun Joe. It is so easy to use. Light weigh to push and light weigh to pick up and put away. Had a hard time at first getting use to the extension cord but not a problem. All in all I love it. I will say that as a older lady living alone, I an't dead yet and I love working in the yard and seeing a nice yard and knowing "I did it".
customer_reviews.author: Jane McCook

customer_reviews.title: No cigar.
customer_reviews.text: I was shipped the 401E Original model in error. I am therefore reviewing that item. The pros: very light, excellent maneuverability and reasonable price. The cons: lacking necessary power, narrow cutting width and necessity to very frequently empty bag. Bottom line: not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Arnie

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This mower works well and it starts every time unlike gas mowers which is the reason I purchased it. The warranty is first class and the company will replace the entire mower if there are any problems within 2 years. However, working around an extension cord requires attention to the mowing. I plan on getting a battery powered mower from the same company after this electric one wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Terry J. Ritchko

customer_reviews.title: Great for small yards
customer_reviews.text: So far cut the grass twice and I really love it! It’s very lightweight and easy to push and handle. I thought maybe the cord would be an issue because I’ve only had gas mowers in the past but so far no problems with running it over. My 13yr old also used it and feels the same...great buy for small yard.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap corded mower
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. I was worried about the power (first electric mower wasn't great), but it cut the grass down extremely well and the grass bag catcher was a life saver. It'll take me some time to get an optimized system for using a corded electric mower, but for the price it's as good as I could have hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Mower - Worth it to go a bit bigger
customer_reviews.text: I had the smaller version of this for a couple of seasons. Really liked it but eventually burned out the motor, my fault. I hesitated to go larger (for the extra dollars) but eventually did. This has a bit more power and seems to be a better made machine in every way. Happy with my purchase. Again it is mainly for smaller yards because you are tethered by an electric cord.
customer_reviews.author: Audio Maven

customer_reviews.title: We love this mower
customer_reviews.text: This mower has really surprised us! It’s small and lightweight but a little beast of power. We have a good sized yard and this does the job quickly a BEAUTIFULLY!!! My husband was absolutely shocked at how awesome it is... It’s nickname is little hulk
customer_reviews.author: faithsmommy

customer_reviews.title: Poor design bag and motor
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it cut quickly and well. I didn't like that the bag filled Very quickly! Too many times I had to empty it! I didn't like that the bag handle kept coming off! Poor design, Cheap! I didn't like that the motor gave out after the 2nd time I mowed my front and back yard!! Returned it for credit! Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D. Irons

customer_reviews.title: lawn looks great
customer_reviews.text: First electric lawn mower. Hate mowing lawns. This is so much better than any other experience for a medium sized yard. Easy to assemble. Noisier than I thought it was but worked better than I expected as well. Quite satisfied with experience and price. Used a 12 extension cord. Heavy but machine worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Philip H Newman, MD

customer_reviews.title: Cheap silent mower with no maintenance
customer_reviews.text: First time use it did great, easy to assemble with the manual and easy to start and use. Chips up smaller sticks like a champ and quieter than a gas. Only complaints are that the front lifts up when the bag gets half way full so I have to hold it down, also the blade got jammed in a really thick patch of long grass but I cleared the jam with ease. I got mine marked as "used" on Amazon for $86 but it was new with a damaged box. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: El Brayan

customer_reviews.title: WHAT’S NOT TO LOVE.
customer_reviews.text: If it is difficult to maneuver, it’s my fault not the mower. Love the weight, runs great and can mow my corner lot in less than an hour - including emptying the grass catcher. If you have to mow your lawn, this mower makes for a hassle-Free job!
customer_reviews.author: leza r westfall

customer_reviews.title: Broken after first use
customer_reviews.text: Really cheap, the handle came off after first use. As seen on this video. I wish they send a replacement that more durable. The machine blade cut really well though. But safe money don’t buy this piece with cheap quality plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sonykim

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last.  Not sure why it was overheating.  I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I used it last summer. It was great. I loved it then. Started to use it this spring for the first time and it is overheating. It is not built to last long.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Triol-Abenojar

customer_reviews.title: powerful
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, cuts through everything I've put it up against, including thick thorny raspberry plants. Its odd getting used to having a cord as I've never had an electric mower before, but I'm so glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I've never had an electric mower. After this one, I'll never go back - love how quiet it is compared to a gasoline-powered mower. I'm sure the neighbors appreciate the little noise it makes even more than me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Power for Little Package
customer_reviews.text: I was using a 24v cordless that could barely get through the front yard. This is very powerful and easy to use mower. Cuts fescue grass very close. One reviewer’s tip to keep the cord at 90 degrees was perfect. My 11 year old daughter easily cut the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Intrigued In San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Mom
customer_reviews.text: I bought the is for my Mom who had a shoulder surgery last year. She is too stubborn to hire help so I wanted something smaller and lighter weight so she wouldn't re-injure herself. She has a small yard and this was perfect for her. She said it cuts great and is easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got bent
customer_reviews.text: Got a great deal on this mower. Unfortunately I was not able to give it a try as it came to me with one wheel off the ground about an inch. The mower somehow got twisted and was not level. I could not recover from this and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Thiel

customer_reviews.title: Great mower
customer_reviews.text: Never owned a lawnmower myself before but used others. I always hated gas mowers because I hate the smell of gas. It’s very easy to start.
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA ROBINSON

customer_reviews.title: great lawn mower vac.
customer_reviews.text: Cuts real well, yet very light. get an extra blade so you always have a sharp one available. i use it to mulch, but in fall i bag my leaves and even pine needles with it. Yes i have to empty bag many times (very quick) but it sucks up the leaves and pine needles and is faster and cleaner than a handheld blower vac.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Works really well, and light enough for the kids
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 11 year old daughter, who traded chores with her brother to get to do the lawn. It is light enough that she has no trouble moving it around or mowing the steep side of the raised driveway (six-ish feet high), and it does a bang-up job on the lawn. The mulch feature only works when the grass just needs an inch or two off the top. When we first moved in the grass was about four inches higher than it should be, and while the mower had no trouble cutting it, the mulching feature just didn't work. The 'bag' is a bit of a PITA, but it is certainly better than raking!
customer_reviews.author: Landshark

customer_reviews.title: easily to assemble without instructions
customer_reviews.text: Came in no time. easily to assemble without instructions. Well packaged and quick delivery. Just put the handles on after unwrapping it. Lightweight and easily maneuverable. Large tires size is an improvement over other small mowers. Powerful motor. I will use it for trimming around objects and hill cutting. I do have a riding mower but can't get into tight spaces with it. The reason I haven't rated it 5 stars is because I haven't had a change to test it out due to the rain but turning it on tells me that this mower has power. Just wanted to report on the receipt and assembly of the item. Will follow up after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Riceke

customer_reviews.title: It does the work.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product couple times and it does the work pretty well. The power cord it’s very uncomfortable, but once you get used to it, you can handle it pretty good. So far no problems.
customer_reviews.author: A. Medina

customer_reviews.title: Good mower for My needs !
customer_reviews.text: The mower does a very good job. It is light, quiet and easy to use. The only negative so far is the handle on the grass catcher will not stay in place. It snaps into the top of the catcher with some difficulty, when the bag is full and you go to remove it the handle comes off in your hand. I will most likely put a screw into it to keep this from happening going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Steve 50

customer_reviews.title: Mulches leaves!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lawnmower in the Fall too mulch leaves. It does a very good job; unfortunately, the bag is too small and fills up right away. If it had a larger bag, I’d be a much happier man in autumn.
customer_reviews.author: The Engineer

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: I mowed my lawn for the first time in months, I didn't think this little mower could handle it. Well I was wrong this lawn mower is the little engine that could. I mean wow I reall5 was suprised by it. I used a 12 guage cord and lets just say, this mower puts gas mowers to shame and it is so light a 8 year old could push it.
customer_reviews.author: Kong67

customer_reviews.title: Nice lawnmower
customer_reviews.text: really nice mower. It was missing a piece. I contacted customer service and they sent me out the missing extension right away. Works great for my little lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: very good machine
customer_reviews.text: Pros: cheap, easy assembly, lower noise level than gas machines, very easy to start and re-start, not much maintenance needed (no oil at all!!), light - easy to push around Cons: not sturdy , need a long rope wire ( or spend more to get one with a battery) Pointers: 1) To start push down the button 1st THEN pull down the level 2) machine is easy to jam which can cause other severe problems, this happens when you try to cut the grass too low so adjust the settings
customer_reviews.author: Yixter

customer_reviews.title: Side blower would be good
customer_reviews.text: It runs well, light, and assembly was easy. I had to purchase bags to place grass clippings in to recycle. This is where I would like a side bag to blow the clippings out the side.
customer_reviews.author: Bepe

customer_reviews.title: front wheels and rear wheels are not the same distance
customer_reviews.text: This lawn mower did everything perfect until you got to close to the fence. The front tires touching the fence does not give the body that holds the blade enough space so it gets squashed causing the blade to cut into the thin plastic of the body the back tires do not protect the body. It needs to be resigned to avoid the body from getting squeezed. So you can not enter any spacing thinking if the front fits it will all fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lawnmower for our small yard and I was surprised by its power and easy maneuverability. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Ed Rosado

customer_reviews.title: Best electric mower I've used!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasantly surprised with this mower! Quiet, easy to assemble, use, clean and store. Just got it today, put it together and mowed the lawn, all within an hour. SO FAR, SO GOOD!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Hodge

customer_reviews.title: does the job well
customer_reviews.text: no complaint so far; i have been using it and glad that i bought it the only drawback i see is that the handle extends long and is not collapsible so it might take space. I can live with it since opening it and reattaching is very easy; because i use a 50 ft wire it is thicker so it is a little harder to get the wire in place
customer_reviews.author: subhra prakash pan

customer_reviews.title: Third time I used it, and not so good!
customer_reviews.text: At first this seemed fine. I only used it twice before the Winter arrived. Now- it's straining and cutting unevenly. I had to go over every inch of my yard three times. Oddly, sometimes it cut better in reverse! My yard looks like a blind man cut it with rusty scissors- using his non-dominant hand!
customer_reviews.author: Artprof67

customer_reviews.title: Light as a feather
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 81 yo neighbor and she loves it. I wouldn't recommend it for heavy-duty, but for cutting grass in the yard it is great. The cord can be a hassle, but a battery makes it heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth H. Sayers

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly (so far)!
customer_reviews.text: I've never had an electric mower before so this is my first. Outside of it sounding like a vacuum cleaner when running, it cuts the grass great! Definitely would recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: light weight
customer_reviews.text: I use this mower for getting into areas were my riding mower cant go and it works great and its a lot less noise than gas power
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our first plug in mower
customer_reviews.text: This is our first plug in mower and we are impressed with it. Just as much power as a regular size push mower. It's super light and very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Scott Doolittle

customer_reviews.title: Happy with My Purchase..
customer_reviews.text: ..so far. I've only used it once. Beware of that bag losing mulch. Also don't assemble too fast and forget the power cord guide. That lil tool I had no idea what it was for until i was done.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: But for someone with a super small yard
customer_reviews.text: Its ok. Wouldn't buy again for my needs. The cord is a hassle. But for someone with a super small yard, who doesn't want to hire lawn care or mess with gas engines, this would be great.
customer_reviews.author: ThirdDayGirl

customer_reviews.title: It really does a great job!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to push! Light wait and it really does a great job! I will recommend it! Plus, can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Formica

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and perfect for small yards.
customer_reviews.text: Get a good, long extension cord and you will enjoy this small yet powerful mower. Grass bag is a little small but easy to empty and put back on. Perfect for small yards.
customer_reviews.author: GlassKR

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My husband new toy!!! it does not make much noise and the bag that collects the grass works very well
customer_reviews.author: Paola De Lima

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: My only quibble is that at the highest blade setting the grass cuts shorter than I prefer. Also add $80 for a 100 foot #12 heavy extension cord. Overall I like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: 100% satisfied. Good little mower for my small yard. I am a senior and needed a light weight mower -
customer_reviews.author: kenna

customer_reviews.title: Lights and easy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product no issues what so ever. Done about 5 -6 mows about 6000 square feet of grass each time with no problems just make sure you use the right extension cords!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Petrosyan

customer_reviews.title: Great for us old people!
customer_reviews.text: I can't start a gas anymore. It takes longer to mow the yard but I don't have to pay for someone else to do it. Figure I'll make my money back in a few weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Kansas 50

customer_reviews.title: Only way two cut
customer_reviews.text: What a machine. This does it all. Great for leave at first I said the bag is too small no way because if it bigger then it's too heavy. (Make sense).. I took the electric line and put it over head with a large spring my lawn is 25x75 cool😀😊
customer_reviews.author: jp.

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Broke before I could use it. :(
customer_reviews.text: Put it together with no problems. Mower arrived with height set for lowest setting. Tried to adjust it and the lever broke. The lever popped out of the plastic "wheel" that adjusted the height. Tried to fix it but could not budge the plastic far enough to re-insert the level. Couldn't mow as the blade was practically on the ground. Unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Dowell

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT TURN ON
customer_reviews.text: I WAS SOOO EXCITED ABOUT MY PURCHASE BUT IT NEVER TURNED ON. 😡 I TRIED EVERYTHING.... SPENT $100 ON AN EXTENSION CORD JUST TO HUMOR MYSELF....AND NOTHING HAPPENED. IT LITERALLY LOOKS LIKE A TOY....MAYBE BARBIE AND KEN CAN GET IT FOR THEIR MALIBU BEACH MANSION.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: I totally agree how great and easy it is to use
customer_reviews.text: I read several reviews on various electric lawn mowers and this one was highly rated. I totally agree how great and easy it is to use.This replaced a very heavy gas mower and it does a fantastic job. I did not use the bag since it is a mulching machine. It is light weight and just what I needed. It does a superior job cutting our lawn. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: quality control!

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and maneuverable. That’s why it was purchased.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase. The mowing takes much less effort.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mower
customer_reviews.text: love my new sunjoe mower. It’s light and works to cut lawn perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Samie

customer_reviews.title: Scam product.
customer_reviews.text: Item was knowingly mailed to me broken. One wheel out of 4 that was broken was separately wrapped inside box and a part to the wheel was missing. The other 3 wheels were on the machine. Wheel assembly is not part of the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: ⭐️

customer_reviews.title: TOUGH little mower.. great value for what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY LOVE this mower... easy to carry along to clear camp sites, tough little thing, the handle of the grass catcher broke on the first use, but we learned to live without it just fine was wimpy and cheap. I did get smart and buy a LOCKING extension cord. to prevent making 5,000 trips to reconnect it.
customer_reviews.author: C.Smith

customer_reviews.title: A good mower with a few minor flaws.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good and lightweight mower with plenty of power. It feels a little cheaply made, particularly the wheels but should last a long time if taken care of. The handle on the collection bag pops off frequently when carrying grass which is a little annoying.
customer_reviews.author: C. Reba

customer_reviews.title: Grass is long it cut it.
customer_reviews.text: What I expected. Have to use to see if I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great mower
customer_reviews.text: Nice mower. First time using electric and it cuts great and very light weight even the wife has used it while I watched
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to operate lawn mower
customer_reviews.text: My father recently passed and my 77 year old mother needed a lightweight, easy to operate lawn mower. This one fit the bill. We had not cut her grass for several weeks, set it on high and away it went. Very easy to operate, very lightweight and does the edges very well. We have only used it once, but I like it!! We did pay attention to the other post about the cord and did get her a heavy cord as suggested.
customer_reviews.author: Kbecker

customer_reviews.title: Great powerful mower for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my small yard. The grass was 13 inches long for the first mow and it breezes through without an issue. Easy to assemble, best electric mower for the price, and powerful motor.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl

customer_reviews.title: Great mower
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to mow my lawn with out pulling on a rope or the upkeep of gas, oil and such. I am female and this is so simple.
customer_reviews.author: McVon

customer_reviews.title: It isn't worth
customer_reviews.text: It didn't last long. I couldn't even finish the session. Its already in the trash can. Spend more and get a better product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Electric mower
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Set on highest level to cut grass and it was to low. Cut uneven.
customer_reviews.author: M.Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller yards
customer_reviews.text: This is our first electric lawn mower. My husband says it works perfectly and was easy for him to clean. I didn't even notice it was in our garage.
customer_reviews.author: E.G.

customer_reviews.title: Burned in less then 2 month
customer_reviews.text: yes, burned in less then 2 month. Not enough power to move a little wet or 3 inch or more height lawn. Not recommended. very light and looks very cheap material made. Better invest few more buks. NOT RECOMMENDED. VERY LOW POWER.
customer_reviews.author: Mayur Patel

customer_reviews.title: mowing the lawn was easy and fast
customer_reviews.text: Once I got used to handling the cord, mowing the lawn was easy and fast. This is the perfect mower for the size lawn I have; less than 500 sq feet. It was more powerful than I anticipated from an electric, corded mower as well, and while it doesn't feature self-propulsion, it's light enough to push one-handed if I wanted to.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: so far great item
customer_reviews.text: still working, the handle on the bag will need to be glued in place ( i'm going to use the UV activated glue, just waiting for it to arrive. watch the small vent door on the top of the bag, when it does not open its time to empty the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Corded electric mower
customer_reviews.text: It is full of intelligently designed features and it is substantially made. Who could ask for more unless it is an inexpensive battery and charger that are included with the mower? The batteries and chargers for the cordless models seem to be sold separately from the mowers. There might be exceptions.
customer_reviews.author: Jules F.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.text: Great little lawn mower. Lightweight and easy to handle. Important to me since I'm 70yrs old and need something easy and convenient. Cuts well in little time. Love the mulching device. No grass clipping to handle. My new favorite toy.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Richter

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, works great
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Light weight and perfect for my small yard. Very glad I decided to get it
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes Rosado-Key

customer_reviews.title: great little mower for a very low price
customer_reviews.text: bought this after trying the hedge trimmer first. this is a great deal, inexpensive but well designed. for the occasional user, Joe tools are a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Chase

customer_reviews.title: Easy.
customer_reviews.text: The lawnmower is lightweight so I can lift it up stairs since I don’t have a garage. I love the 7 different heights it allows. Easy maneuverability. Glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sue V.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I liked every thing about this mower. Powerful and lightweight. Easily mowed down thatch grass 20 inches high without stalling or loosing power. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P

product_meta.title: Sun Joe MJ403E Mow Joe 17-Inch 13-Amp Electric Lawn Mower/Mulcher
product_meta.description: Color:GreenLawn cleanup just got easier with the Sun Joe Mow Joe MJ403E. No more messy gas or oil! Just power up your Mow Joe with the push of a button and watch its powerful 13-amp motor mow a 17-inch wide path in a single pass. Easily control the cutting height of your grass with the 7 position height adjustment lever. The 12 gallon rear bag detaches easily to quickly dispose of grass clippings. You can even turn your Mow Joe lawn mower into a mulching mower by removing the bag and allowing the grass clippings to insert back into your lawn. Whether mulching or mowing, the MJ403E delivers the reliable performance you and your lawn can depend on every time. The MJ403E provides the extra security of a safety switch and is backed by a full two year warranty. Detachable grass collection bag for easy disposal
feature_bullets: POWERFUL: 13-amp motor cuts a 17-inch wide path
HEIGHT CONTROL: Tailor cutting Height with 7-position Height control
CONVERTIBLE: Mulching + mowing function. Size of Yard - 1/4 - 1/2 Acre. No Load Speed (rpm)- 3500
GRASS COLLECTOR: Detachable grass collection bag for easy disposal

WE’VE GOT YOU COVERED!: Your new lawn mower is backed by the Snow Joe + Sun Joe Customer Promise. We will warrant new, powered products for two years from the date of purchase. NO QUESTIONS ASKED. Contact Snow Joe + Sun Joe customer support at 1-866-766-9563 for further assistance.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars496 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
